General.Name: Shanghai Xuerong Bio-Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Xuerong Biotechnology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the research and development, industrial planting, and sale of fresh edible mushrooms in the People's Republic of China. It offers enoki, shiitake, king oyster, and shiitake mushrooms, as well as deer Flammulina velutipes. The company was formerly known as Shanghai Gaorong Food Co., Ltd. Shanghai Xuerong Biotechnology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.
General.Address: No. 1487, Huifeng West Road, Shanghai, China, 201401
